description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Simply collect the coloured gems to match your colour - then change your colour to collect the others - Simple - but amazingly Challenging - With 70 levels to beat.
description.short: Simply collect the coloured gems to match your colour - then change your colour to collect the others - Simple - but amazingly Challenging - With 70 levels to beat.
